key.name: eye-position
key.summary: Position of the eyes on the screen
key.description: Defines the position of the eyes on the panel. Supported values are 'left', 'center', and 'right'.

key.name: eye-index
key.summary: Index of the eye in panel section
key.description: Indicates the priority of the eyes in the panel section order.

key.name: eye-count
key.description: Specifies the total number of eye instances to be displayed on the screen.

key.name: eye-width
key.description: Defines the width of each eye button, affecting drawing space and padding.

key.name: eye-reactive
key.description: Determines if the eyes respond to clicks.

key.name: eye-shape
key.description: Specifies the shape of the eyes. Supported values are 'eyelid' and 'round'.

key.name: eye-line-width
key.summary: Line width of the eye drawing
key.description: Sets the thickness of the lines used to draw the eyes.

key.name: eye-iris-color-enabled
key.summary: Whether The custom iris color is used.
key.description: Determines if the iris is drawn in the custom color or the foreground color.

key.name: eye-iris-color
key.summary: Color of the iris of the eyes.
key.description: Sets a custom color for the iris of the eye.

key.name: eye-repaint-interval
key.description: Specifies the time interval in milliseconds between each redraw of the eyes. Default is 16ms, equivalent to 62.5fps.

key.name: tracker-shape
key.description: The filename of the image used as the tracker shape. This image is displayed as the tracker cursor.

key.name: tracker-size
key.description: Defines the dimensions of the tracker element in pixels.

key.name: tracker-color-default
key.description: Sets the default color of the tracker. The value is specified in hexadecimal format.

key.name: tracker-color-left
key.summary: Color of the tracker on left click
key.description: Specifies the color of the tracker when a left-click event is detected. The value is in hexadecimal format.

key.name: tracker-color-middle
key.summary: Color of the tracker on middle click
key.description: Specifies the color of the tracker when a middle-click event is detected. The value is in hexadecimal format.

key.name: tracker-color-right
key.summary: Color of the tracker on right click
key.description: Specifies the color of the tracker when a right-click event is detected. The value is in hexadecimal format.

key.name: tracker-opacity
key.description: Sets the opacity level of the tracker. The value is an integer between 0 (completely transparent) and 100 (fully opaque).

key.name: tracker-repaint-interval
key.description: Specifies the time interval in milliseconds between each redraw of the tracker. Default is 16ms, equivalent to 62.5fps.

key.name: tracker-keybinding
key.summary: Keyboard shortcut for toggling the tracker
key.description: Defines the keyboard shortcut that toggles the visibility or functionality of the tracker.
